meta.Summary::
Report on the investigation of 
the close-quarters situation between the ro-ro passenger ferry Maersk Dover, the tanker 
Apollonia and the container vessel Maersk Vancouver in the Dover Strait on 17 October 2006. Report No 9/2007. Published 17 May 2007.

title: Investigation report - Maersk Dover/Apollonia/Maersk Vancouver
